course_title: The Life and Thought of Paul of Tarsus

sections.comments: Visit https://cnrs.ubc.ca/fall2020courses/ for information on course delivery.If this course is full or blocked, please register in the waitlist. Detailed information for this course in 2020W is available at https://rgst.arts.ubc.ca/rgst-courses/rgst-400/.

description: The life and literature of Paul in the Roman imperial world: letter writing, patronage and power; Roman imperial iconography; Paul and community formation.
